features.title: Never get lost in your grow again

journal.title: Organized grow timeline

identityTrust.description: My Bud was born from the frustration of forgetting the last watering, missing the flip to flower day or confusing genetics. It's a smart diary that understands your routine â€” with lightness, privacy and respect for your freedom to grow.

private.title: Smart integration

testimonials.title: Loved by growers

comingSoon.title: Coming soon to your favorite stores
comingSoon.subtitle: Be the first to know when My Bud arrives in app stores
comingSoon.ctaText: Join the beta now for early access before the official launch

faq1.question: Is the app free?
faq1.answer: You'll be able to use it for free, with a plant limit. Those who join the beta get premium access unlocked for 6 months.

faq2.question: Does it work offline?
faq2.answer: Not yet. But we're optimizing everything to work fast and light even with poor internet.

faq3.question: Is it safe to use?
faq3.answer: The real talk: 100% anonymity doesn't exist. We save as little as possible, but your IP still goes through our servers. Unfortunately, silence is still the best protection for growers â€” and we respect that. Nothing is shared. The law requires keeping some data, and we follow what's necessary. But you decide what to record or not.

faq4.question: Do I need to show my plants?
faq4.answer: No. You can record everything without taking a single photo. Everything is optional.

faq5.question: Can I use it just to organize without logging everything?
faq5.answer: Of course. If you just want to see flower days and know when to harvest, that's already worth it.

appShowcase.title: How it works
appShowcase.subtitle: A simple, effective process to put your brand inside the growerâ€™s routine.

dashboard.title: Step 1 â€” Data that matters
dashboard.desc: Your feeding, pest or care chart becomes an interactive schedule in the app. The grower receives tasks at the right phase, with doses, tips and visual proof of use. You track adherence, drop-off and repurchase â€” all aggregated and anonymous.

voice.title: Step 2 â€” Useful, visible usage
voice.desc: Your brand appears naturally in tasks and the grow diary, with stickers on photos and videos.

qr.title: Step 3 â€” Follow your influencers
qr.desc: See in real time how strategic profiles use your product, with stickers and unique codes to track sales.

alerts.title: Step 4 (optional) â€” From label to app
alerts.desc: If you want, we can connect your packaging to the app via QR to take customers straight to your productâ€™s schedule. Not required to start.

sponsorship.title: Cannabis marketing is locked down, we unlock it with real data.
sponsorship.subtitle: Ad restrictions, shallow metrics and campaigns that never become routine. MyBud puts your brand at the exact moment of the grow, inside the app the grower opens every day, and delivers actionable data on the real use of your products.

stats.title: Weâ€™re after numbers that matter
stats.description: With a grow-focused app available in three languages from day one, weâ€™re set to scale. Weâ€™re looking for partnerships that create real impact â€” here are the numbers we expect to hit together.*
stats.note: *Projections based on early tests and potential market size.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Quick answers to get you started.

q0.q: What data and insights will I receive?
q0.a: Adherence to schedule, drop-off, repurchase, visual proof and aggregated metrics to guide decisions.

q1.q: How does the brand appear and get measured?
q1.a: Inside phase-based tasks, public diaries and profile showcases. We track adherence, drop-off, repurchase and visual proof â€” always aggregated and anonymous.

q2.a: Yes. Tech sheet, videos, tips and schedules aligned with your product line.

q3.q: How does public grower sponsorship work?
q3.a: You pick strategic profiles. Your brand shows in their posts and tasks with stickers. Real-time monitoring of usage.

q4.a: We can work exclusivity by period and category in strategic agreements.

q5.q: Can I track sales or leads?
q5.a: We deliver UTMs and coupons for attribution plus repurchase reports when applicable.
